de.agilecoders.wicket.util

Class BootstrapLessCompiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.agilecoders.wicket.util.BootstrapLessCompiler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBootstrapLessCompiler

    public class BootstrapLessCompiler
extends Object
implements IBootstrapLessCompiler
    An IBootstrapLessCompiler implementation that loads all less files and their imports and compiles them to an optimized css stream.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    miha
